title: instagram
subtitle: Showcase a selection of your finest filtered Instagram images directly on your Brand's Facebook Page.
bells_whistles: Choose to feature images from a username or #hashtag, and showcase them beautifully in their high-res glory. Because Instagram has no web-interface, our unique integration allows you to get more milege out of your mobile-saavy fans when they get back to their desks.

features.title: Fan Gating
features.description: Our fan gate feature entices new viewers to like your Page before they can interact with the app's content. This can explosively drive up your fan count, giving you a large audience to message, activate promotions, and push out must-have content to in the future.

features.title: Flexible Commenting
features.description: The optional comments box encourages the chatter around your content, driving additional awareness and traffic to the Page. We added the ability to use native Facebook Comments or a 3rd party module from Disqus which gives you more flexibility to use this app for promotional purposes. Comments can also be turned off for a cleaner viewing experience.

features.title: Customizable Sharing
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page. We also added the ability to customize the text on the share button to give you even more control.

features.title: Total Control
features.description: An optional customizable and linkable header, turned on/off via the Content Management Panel, allows for important brand impressions. The addition of a custom text headline allows you to drive the point home.
